The claim was made by Bollywood filmmake: who tweeted screenshots of a Facebook post by JNU student Afzal Husain Khan and his Facebook bio.
The Facebook post mentioned a plan to mo: phase 2" and use a flash mob strategy similar to Hong Kong protests.
Multiple Twitter users: including the handle @RealHistoriPix, also circulated the claim that Afzal Husain Khan had planned violence in the JNU campus.
Alt News: an independent fact-checking organization, found that the claim was false and clarified that Khan was formerly associated with AISA and had edited his post to specify that "phase 2" referred to Okhla Phase 2.
